module.name: Backup & Restore
module.description: Backup & Restore for your FreePBX environment
module.changelog: *2.5.1.7* #3640 *2.5.1.6* localization updates *2.5.1.5* #3323 backup fails if zaptel.conf or dahdi directory not present *2.5.1.4* #3238, spelling *2.5.1.3* description added to xml, Swedish *2.5.1.2* #3077 (DAHDI Support), Swedish Translations *2.5.1.1* spelling *2.5.1* #2987, #2995, #3037 sqlite3 support, removal of retrieve_backup_cron.pl *2.5.0.2* #2743 don't delete the current astdb entries if the new astdb.dump is empty *2.5.0.1* #2884 include zaptel.conf in backup *2.5.0* #2889, #2845, #2353, added delete and add icons *2.4.1.1* #2694 display problem with any all selection *2.4.1* #2269 clear several of the astdb objects before restore, and other bug fixes *2.4.0* CHANGELOG TRUNCATED See SVN Repository
